summary: Two brothers need household help after their Ma passes away. They decide to join a romance tour to Russia to find and bring home a traditionally minded wife.
cast: Tim Blake Nelson|David Arquette|Lois Smith|Redmond Gleeson|Rocío Linares|Allyce Beasley|Larry Pine|Megan Follows|Emily Mortimer|Nonna Velikaya
title: Una mujer para dos hermanos
